issue.title: [Go] Slice Array equality
issue.body:

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4973?focusedCommentId=16820224) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Can you elaborate what you are asking for here?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4973?focusedCommentId=16820924) by Alexandre Crayssac (alexandreyc):*
Comparing two contiguous sub-array (slices). Not sure if it's really useful though...

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4973?focusedCommentId=16863408) by Sebastien Binet (sbinet):*
